verbs.description: as [V: trump] restores sanctions iranians mark anniversary of us embassy takeover thousands of iranians rallied in tehran on sunday to mark the 39th anniversary of the u s embassy takeover as washington restored all sanctions lifted under the nuclear deal nbc news reported the crowd israel iran trump obama administration washington donald trump tehran president united states mark anniversary u s embassy interim government of iran 1979 us mohammad reza pahlavi shah mohammad reza pahlavi nbc news us embassy
